home.title: Welcome to LiteMaaS
home.subtitle: Your Model as a Service platform for accessing and managing AI models.

cards.chatbotDescription: Test and experiment with AI models
cards.modelsAriaLabel: Navigate to Models page to browse and subscribe to AI models
cards.subscriptionsAriaLabel: Navigate to Subscriptions page to manage your model subscriptions

cards.usageAriaLabel: Navigate to Usage page to monitor your API usage and metrics

login.title: Log in to LiteMaaS

models.title: Available Models
models.subtitle: Discover and subscribe to AI models from various providers
models.description: Model discovery and subscription functionality coming soon.
models.loadingDescription: Discovering available AI models from all providers
models.emptyStateMessage: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters to find models.
models.modelUnavailable: This model is currently unavailable for new subscriptions.

notifications.subscribeSuccessDesc: You now have access to {{modelName}}. You can generate keys from the API Keys page.
notifications.alreadySubscribed: You are already subscribed to this model
notifications.loadErrorDesc: Failed to load models from the server.
notifications.loadFailed: Failed to load models. Please try again.

modal.subscribeInfo: By subscribing, you'll get access to this model and can generate API keys to use it.

subscriptions.title: Model Subscriptions
subscriptions.pageSubtitle: Manage your AI model subscriptions and usage
subscriptions.noSubscriptionsDescription: You don't have any active subscriptions. Start by subscribing to an AI model.
subscriptions.suspendedMessage: Your subscription has been suspended. Contact support or check your account status.
subscriptions.expiredMessage: Your subscription expired on {{date}}. Renew to continue using this model.
subscriptions.cancelledMessage: {{modelName}} subscription has been cancelled and removed from your account.

notifications.loadErrorDesc: Failed to load subscriptions from the server.
notifications.cancelErrorDesc: Failed to cancel subscription. Please try again.
notifications.cannotCancelDesc: There are active API keys linked to this subscription. Please delete all API keys first, then cancel the subscription.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.selectAllModelsAriaLabel: Select or deselect all available models

forms.name: Name
forms.nameHelperText: Enter a unique name to identify this API key
forms.descriptionHelperText: Optional description to help you remember the purpose of this API key
forms.modelsHelperText: Select one or more models that this API key can access
forms.modelsSelectedText: {{count}} model(s) selected for this API key
forms.modelsAriaLabel: Select models for API key access

messages.noSubscribedModelsError: No subscribed models found. You need an active subscription to a model before creating an API key.
messages.secureRetrievalMessage: Click the eye icon above to securely retrieve your full LiteLLM API key. For security reasons, this requires recent authentication and is rate-limited. All key retrievals are logged for audit purposes.
messages.keyCreatedMessage: Your API key has been created successfully.
messages.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the API key {{name}}?
messages.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. The API key will be permanently removed and applications using this key will lose access immediately.
messages.keyRevokedMessage: This API key has been revoked and can no longer be used.
messages.keyExpiredMessage: This API key has expired on {{date}}.
messages.retrievalMessage: Your LiteLLM API key has been retrieved securely. Retrieved at: {{date}}
messages.managementDescription: Manage API keys for accessing LiteMaaS services
messages.noKeysDescription: Create your first API key to start using LiteMaaS services.
messages.noKeysScreenReader: You currently have no API keys. Use the Create API Key button to create your first key and start using LiteMaaS services.
messages.errorScreenReader: Error loading API keys: {{error}}. Use the Try Again button to retry loading.

placeholders.keyDescription: Optional description of this key's purpose

notifications.loadErrorDesc: Failed to load API keys from the server.
notifications.loadModelErrorDesc: Failed to load your subscribed models.
notifications.createErrorDesc: Failed to create API key. Please try again.
notifications.updateErrorDesc: Failed to update API key. Please try again.
notifications.deleteErrorDesc: Failed to delete API key. Please try again.
notifications.modelsRequired: Please select at least one model from your active subscriptions
notifications.pleaseFixFormErrors: Please fix the form errors and try again

tableHeaders.apiKeysTableCaption: Table showing {{count}} API keys with their names, preview values, assigned models, and available actions. {{description}}
tableHeaders.apiKeysTableStructure: Use arrow keys to navigate between rows and Tab to access action buttons within each row.
tableHeaders.keyDetailsCaption: Table showing detailed information for the API key '{{keyName}}' including models, creation date, and usage statistics
tableHeaders.generatedKeyDetailsCaption: Table showing details for the newly created API key '{{keyName}}' including assigned models and expiration date

apiKeys.copyKeyAriaLabel: Copy API key value for {{keyName}} to clipboard
apiKeys.fullKeyVisible: Full API key value for {{keyName}} is now visible
apiKeys.keyPreviewOnly: Showing preview of API key {{keyName}} - click show to reveal full key

usage.title: Usage Dashboard
usage.subtitle: Monitor your API usage, costs, and performance metrics
usage.exportUsageData: Export usage data for the selected time period
usage.loadingDescription: Analyzing your API usage patterns and metrics
usage.noDataDescription: Start making API requests to see your usage statistics here.
usage.noDataScreenReader: No usage data is currently available. Make API requests using your API keys to generate usage statistics that will be displayed here.
usage.customDatePlaceholderDescription: Please select start and end dates above to view usage statistics for your custom date range.
usage.customDatePlaceholderScreenReader: Custom date range mode is active. Select both start and end dates using the date pickers above to load usage statistics.
usage.noApiKeysScreenReader: No API keys found. Create your first API key to start tracking usage statistics.
usage.selectApiKeyScreenReader: Select an API key from the dropdown above to view its usage statistics and metrics.
usage.noApiKeysDescription: Create an API key to start tracking your usage statistics.
usage.selectApiKeyDescription: Please select an API key from the dropdown above to view its usage statistics.

charts.noDataExplanation: There are currently no {{metricType}} to display for the selected time period. Try selecting a different date range or check back after making some API requests.
charts.noDataDescription: No {{metricType}} data found for the current time period selection
charts.noDataSummary: {{chartType}} showing no {{metricType}} data for the selected time period
charts.noDataSuggestions: Try making some API requests or selecting a different date range to see {{metricType}} trends over time.
charts.noDataScreenReader: {{chartType}} for {{metricType}} data in the {{timeframe}} period contains no data points. Try selecting a different time period or make some API requests to see usage trends.
charts.chartFocused: {{chartType}} focused. Contains {{dataPoints}} data points. Use Tab to navigate chart controls or press T to toggle table view.
charts.noModelsDescription: No model usage data available for the selected period.
charts.modelDistributionAriaLabel: Donut chart showing model usage distribution
charts.lineChartDescription: This line chart displays {{metricType}} usage over time
charts.donutChartDescription: This donut chart shows the distribution of requests across different AI models
charts.usageTrendsDescription: Line chart showing {{metricType}} trends over the selected time period
charts.usageTrendsSummary: Chart contains {{totalPoints}} data points with values ranging from {{minValue}} to {{maxValue}}, average of {{avgValue}}. The overall trend is {{trend}}
charts.modelDistributionSummary: Distribution chart shows usage across {{totalModels}} models. The top model is {{topModel}} accounting for {{topPercentage}}% of {{totalRequests}} total requests
charts.legendDescription: Visual representation of {{metricType}} data over time

tables.topModelsCaption: Table showing {{count}} top models by usage for {{dateRange}}, with a total of {{totalRequests}} requests. Use arrow keys to navigate between rows.

progressLabels.successRateProgress: Success rate progress bar: {{percentage}}% successful requests ({{successfulRequests}} of {{totalRequests}} total requests)
progressLabels.modelUsageProgress: Usage progress bar for {{model}}: {{percentage}}% of total requests ({{requests}} out of {{totalRequests}})

notifications.loadErrorDesc: Failed to load usage metrics from the server.
notifications.loadFailed: Failed to load usage metrics. Please try again.
notifications.exportStartedDesc: Your usage data export is being prepared and will be downloaded shortly.
notifications.exportCompleteDesc: Usage data has been exported successfully.
notifications.exportFailedDesc: Failed to export usage data. Please try again.
notifications.customDatesRequired: Please select both start and end dates for custom range export.
notifications.apiKeysLoadErrorDesc: Unable to retrieve your API keys. Please refresh the page or try again later.

usage.metricsUpdated: Usage metrics updated. {{requests}} total requests, {{tokens}} total tokens, {{cost}} total cost

tools.title: Tools
tools.modelsDescription: Synchronize AI models from LiteLLM to ensure you have access to the latest available models.
tools.syncErrorGeneric: An error occurred while synchronizing models. Please try again.
tools.adminRequired: Admin access required to sync models
tools.limitsDescription: Set resource limits for all users in the system. Changes will apply to all active users. Defaults for new users won't change.
tools.maxBudgetHelper: Maximum spending limit per user in dollars
tools.tpmLimitHelper: Maximum tokens per minute for each user
tools.rpmLimitHelper: Maximum requests per minute for each user
tools.confirmBulkUpdateMessage: This will update all active users with the specified limits. This action cannot be undone.
tools.leaveEmptyToKeep: Leave empty to keep current value
tools.bulkUpdateErrorGeneric: An error occurred while updating user limits. Please try again.
tools.noValuesProvided: Please provide at least one limit value
tools.noValuesProvidedDescription: You must specify at least one limit to update.
tools.bannerDescription: Create and manage announcements that appear at the top of the application for all users.
tools.bannerStatusHelper: Toggle to show or hide the banner for all users
tools.bannerEnglishRequired: English content is required (other languages are optional)
tools.bannerStyleHelper: Choose the visual style that best matches your announcement type
tools.allowDismissHelper: When enabled, users can dismiss the banner for their session
tools.enableMarkdownHelper: Support **bold** text and [links](URL) in banner content
tools.bannerSavedDescription: The banner announcement has been updated and will be visible to users immediately
tools.bannerSaveErrorGeneric: An error occurred while saving the banner. Please try again.
tools.bannerNamePlaceholder: Enter a descriptive name for this banner
tools.noBannersFound: No banners found. Create your first banner to get started.
tools.confirmDeleteBannerMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
tools.bannerDeletedDescription: The banner has been deleted successfully.
tools.bannerDeleteErrorGeneric: An error occurred while deleting the banner. Please try again.
tools.bannerCreatedDescription: The banner has been created successfully.
tools.changesAppliedDescription: Banner visibility changes have been applied successfully.
tools.applyChangesErrorGeneric: An error occurred while applying changes. Please try again.
tools.bannerVisibilityNote: Visibility is managed at table level
tools.bannerVisibilityNoteDescription: Use the visibility toggles in the table to show/hide banners. Only one banner can be visible at a time.
tools.dismissalResetNote: Note: Saving any changes will make the banner visible again to all users who previously dismissed it.

chatbot.subtitle: Test and interact with AI models using a direct chat interface

welcome.title: Welcome to the Chatbot Playground
welcome.description: Select an API key and model from the configuration panel above, then start chatting to test your AI models directly.

accessibility.viewModeToggle: Toggle between chart and table view

accessibility.tableNavigationInstructions: Use arrow keys to navigate between rows and columns, or Tab to move to the next interactive element.
